author: Staff Reporter
text:
Refuting allegations surrounding the death of a first year student on the campus of their engineering college, Sai Prakash Leo Muthu, CEO of Sairam Institutions said the student committed suicide owing to his academic performance. Addressing a press meet, Mr. Sai Prakash said an alumnus of the Sairam Polytechnic college had been instigating a few students to defame the institution.

Sai Prakash said that an alumnus of the Sairam Polytechnic

had been instigating a few students
title: College management refutes charge
